reasoning_steps: Step 1: Sourced holder-level AAPL share counts and (where available) market value and portfolio % from public institutional ownership datasets and 13F-derived pages (BusinessQuant, SimplyWallSt, Optionar/13F-derived, SensaMarket/13F-derived, StockNinja).

Step 2: Compiled candidate holders and ranked by shares held; selected the top 15 and populated rows 2-16 in the Holders sheet (columns Investor, Shares Held, Market Value, % of Portfolio, % Ownership).

Step 3: Kept the Rubric sheet unmodified and preserved the Holders template structure; attempted workbook recalculation via headless LibreOffice but the environment lacked the soffice binary, so no LibreOffice recalculation could be executed here.
